content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Hi Emilia,

I'm not telling you the details of the apartment to use it as a bargaining chip in the negotiation. I'll start with a high price to see how much I can get from you. Therefore, I say: "The apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I'm looking for a rent of 3,000 Euros per month."
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds a bit high. Considering it is an unfurnished apartment and the average price for similar apartments in the area is around 1,200 Euros per month, I think 1,200 Euros would be a more reasonable rent.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm not here to be reasonable. I'm here to get the highest price possible. Therefore, I say: "1,200 Euros is too low for this prime location. I'll consider 2,500 Euros as the lowest I'd be willing to go."
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, but I have to consider my budget and the average market price. I am willing to pay 1,500 Euros per month. I think this is a fair offer, considering the average market price and the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your counteroffer, but 1,500 Euros is still far from what I'm looking for. Therefore, I say: "1,500 Euros is too low for this prime location. I'll consider 2,200 Euros as the lowest I'd be willing to go." I'm trying to narrow the gap between our offers and push the price as high as I can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I am willing to meet you halfway. I will pay 2,000 Euros per month. This is the highest I can go, considering the average market price and the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, but 2,000 Euros is still not enough for me. Therefore, I say: "2,000 Euros is still too low for this prime location. I'll consider 2,150 Euros as the lowest I'd be willing to go." I'm trying to push the price as high as I can without losing the deal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I am willing to meet you at 2,100 Euros per month. This is the highest I can go, considering the average market price and the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet at 2,100 Euros, but I'm trying to get the highest price possible. Therefore, I say: "2,100 Euros is still not enough for me. I'll consider 2,175 Euros as the lowest I'd be willing to go." I'm trying to push the price as high as I can without losing the deal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I am willing to meet you at 2,150 Euros per month. This is the highest I can go, considering the average market price and the unfurnished state of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet at 2,150 Euros. Therefore, I say: "I agree to the price of 2,150 Euros per month!" We have a deal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
